com.devclue.grouper.subject
Class CSV2JDBC

java.lang.Object
  com.devclue.grouper.subject.CSV2JDBC
public class CSV2JDBC
extends java.lang.Object

Populate I2MI's JDBC subject source from an input CSV file.

Constructor Detail

Method Detail

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Read CSV on STDIN and add subjects to Groups Registry.

The CSV parser understands the following semantics: 

 # This is a comment
 subject id,subject type
 subject id,subject type,name
 subject id,subject type,name attribute,loginID attribute

Internally, CSV2JDBC parses the CSV entries into a collection of MockSubject objects that are added to the JDBC Source via SubjectAdd. 

 // Read Subject CSV on STDIN and add subjects to the JDBC Source.
 % java com.devclue.grouper.subject.CSV2JDBC

addSubjects

public void addSubjects(java.util.List subjects)
                 throws java.lang.RuntimeException
Add a list of MockSubject subjects. 
 // Read Subject CSV on STDIN and add found entries to JDBC Source.
 CSV2JDBC c2j       = new CSV2JDBC();
 List     subjects  = c2j.parseCSVFile( 
   new BufferedReader(
     new InputStreamReader(System.in)
   )
 );
 c2j.addSubjects(subjects);

Parameters:
subjects - A list of mock subjects to add.
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException

parseCSVFile

public java.util.List parseCSVFile(java.io.Reader r)
                            throws java.lang.RuntimeException
Parse a CSV file into a list of MockSubject objects. 
 // Read Subject CSV on STDIN and return a list of mock subjects.
 CSV2JDBC c2j       = new CSV2JDBC();
 List     subjects  = c2j.parseCSVFile( 
   new BufferedReader(
     new InputStreamReader(System.in)
   )
 );

Parameters:
r - CSV reader stream.
Returns:
List of MockSubject objects. `
Throws:
java.lang.RuntimeException
